name: Solaris Kassiopi Apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the solaris apartments during the last wek of the holidays. I chose to book these apartments based on good reviews I had read and was not disappointed.
reviews.title: Solaris a little gem

reviews.text: I had originally booked a studio and was very pleasantly suprised to be awarded with a 2 bedroom apartment which had a fantastic balcony overlooking the pool area and a great place to watch the sunset each evening.
reviews.title: Solaris, Oh what a fantastic place to stay

likes.liked: — Location, Friendliness, Cleanliness & Value for money

reviews.text: I have just returned from a holiday in wonderful Kassiopi, shared with my 23 year old son, who has severe learning difficulties. We stayed at the Solaris complex, and travelled with Thomsons.
reviews.title: Filthy apartment at the end of the season

reviews.text: Fantastic central position, but off the main street, so very little night noise.
reviews.title: Fantastic Holidays

reviews.text: Very well laid out externally, with clean pools and plenty of free sunbeds.
reviews.title: Travelling alone? Forget Solaris

reviews.text: Hmmmm..... this is a tricky one! Well we were told about these apartments by our friends who go there every year. We arranged to meet several other families there all with teenagers. Unfortunately we arrived several days before they did and initially we were'nt impressed. We arrived in the early hours of the morning in total darkness. The taxi driver had to go and wake up Kostas' dad who seemed furious! He threw the door open with not a smile or a word of welcome and i was very upset by this. We entered the room which was gloomy and basic, on the verge of being shabby really and at that point I could've wept. It was 2 bedrroms both with single beds and a tiny dark kitchen with a table squashed in at one end next to a basic bathroom. The beds were VERY uncomfortable. The next day I asked to be moved but in August of course they were full. However no one asked what the problem was or came to explain that a move was impossible. The pools are lovely to look at but the main pool especially turns all your swim wear green. I was told this is not a problem. The yucky toilet bin was not emptied every single day, a few days were missed and our bin got full, not what you need to be worrying about on holiday, other than that our room was kept clean.
reviews.title: Mixed Feelings at first....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anyway, we sulked and brooded for a few days until our friends arrived then we snapped out of it and had a truly fabulous time! I viewed some of the other Solaris apartments which were much nicer than ours. (room 8) Someone told me that our block is the last one about to be refurbished, I dont know if that's true but I guess we drew the short straw because we booked in Feb. I must say that nearly everyone we spoke to go back year after year after year so it must be me being picky cos everyone else was delighted.
reviews.title: A lovely holiday, perfect for anyone who wants a relaxing break

reviews.text: It's in a great area, everything you need just a stones throw away. Despite all the niggles I can see the attraction so dont let my rather negative review put anyone off, we just lucked out on the room. Also take dark coloured bikinis and if your hair is blonde expect it to be lime green at the end of the stay!
reviews.title: Perfect spot for your Kassiopi stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kassiopi is a lovely places with lots of friendly people, good resturants and a generally lovely holiday atmosphere. Food and drink are pretty cheap in the area with most meals (for two people) coming to around 25 euros. All of the resturant and bar staff are very welcoming as were the staff in the Solaris resort itself, who would often have a chat with us. Alongside this Solaris also has a wonderful, refreshing pool and benifits from being set back a bit from the road which means at night we weren't disturbed by bar/resturant nosie. Despite other reviews which comment about the toliet bins not being emptied regularly enough, we found this not to be the case and in fact found our room was cleaned almost every day. Overall my partner and I had a truly lovely holiday and I would recommned Solaris and Kassiopi to both families and couples, its got a bit of something for everyone.
reviews.title: 10/10 Absolutly fantastic!!!!

reviews.text: Solaris is an attractive complex located just off the main street in Kassiopi. Although it’s close to all the night life and action, which in Kassiopi is good natured and not too full on, there is no noise at night to keep you awake. You get the best of both worlds! The apartment we stayed in was clean and spacious with a fitted kitchen and a lovely tiled bathroom. The accommodation was of a higher standard than other places I've stayed on Corfu.
reviews.title: Sunny Holidays

description: Solaris apt offers high standard accommodation with excellent facilities making it a perfect choice for families and couples. Its ideal position combined with the love and care with which the complex was made and is maintained makes many visitors come back on a regular basis. Solaris covers all accommodation needs and apartments types.
